name: Curve25519.Signing.PublicKey
desc: A Curve25519 public key used to verify cryptographic signatures.

items.name: init<D>(rawRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a Curve25519 public key from a data representation.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A representation of the public key.

items.name: func isValidSignature<S, D>(S, for: D) -> Bool
items.desc: Verifies an EdDSA signature over Curve25519.
